title: Gamified Learning Program for Wild Bee Ecology Education

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with elementary ecology terminology and mobile app utilization skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening Ecological Communication Skills Linked to Language Education

learning_goals: Learners can produce a 10-minute educational video explaining the role of wild bees in ecosystems.
Learners can propose three practical measures for conserving wild bee habitats using a gamification app.
Learners can complete an ecology scenario-based language project report posted on the LMS with peer evaluation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
